Command.Name: ExtendedAnalysisVersion
Command.Description: Provides a version of the Extended Analysis command

Command.Name: ExtendedAnalysisDataCollector
Command.Description: Provides values of internal control variables at run-time.

Command.Name: ExtendedAnalysisPosPropagation
Command.Description: Provides values of position as it propagates from raw A/D to scaled position.

Variable.Name: eadc_UserSetpoint
Variable.Description: Signal or Manual setpoint as requested by a user (not rate-limited), counts

Variable.Name: eadc_RateLimitedSetpoint
Variable.Description: Momentary value of setpoint with rate limit applied, counts

Variable.Name: eadc_PositionScaled
Variable.Description: Normalized position in counts

Variable.Name: eadc_PWM
Variable.Description: Actual (possibly normalized) PWM output of the FW

Variable.Name: eadc_CtlOutput
Variable.Description: Output in counts, computed by control program (prior to normalizing, which converts it to PWM output).

Variable.Name: eadc_P_pilot
Variable.Description: Pilot pressure, counts

Variable.Name: eadc_P_main
Variable.Description: Pressure P1 – P2 for double acting and P1 for single acting, counts

Variable.Name: eadc_P_1
Variable.Description: Pressure P1, counts

Variable.Name: eadc_P_2
Variable.Description: Pressure P2 (counts) if double acting, 0 if single acting

Variable.Name: eadc_P_supply
Variable.Description: Supply presssure, counts

Variable.Name: eadc_AvgErr
Variable.Description: Average of 8 sequential errors (from a moving window) in counts

Variable.Name: eadc_MinErr
Variable.Description: Min error of 8 sequential errors (from a moving window) in counts

Variable.Name: eadc_MaxErr
Variable.Description: Max error of 8 sequential errors (from a moving window) in counts

Variable.Name: eadc_PosComp
Variable.Description: Last computed PosComp

Variable.Name: eadc_P_element
Variable.Description: P (Proportional)term of PID control

Variable.Name: eadc_D_element
Variable.Description: D (Derivative) term of PID control

Variable.Name: eadc_Boost_element
Variable.Description: Boost component of the control algorithm

Variable.Name: eadc_Fast_elements
Variable.Description: Total of fast-acting components of the control algorithm.\nThe sum of P, D -terms and Boost; Integral is excluded.

Variable.Name: eadc_Integral
Variable.Description: Momentary value of Integral component

Variable.Name: eadc_Bias
Variable.Description: Momentary value of Bias

Variable.Name: eadc_Overshoots
Variable.Description: Number of overshoots

Variable.Name: eadc_JigglesPassed
Variable.Description: Number of passed jiggle tests

Variable.Name: eadc_CalcPeriod
Variable.Description: Period of adding Integral to Bias (counted in control periods).

Variable.Name: eadc_IntegalCount
Variable.Description: Number of cycles since last addition integral to bias (reset to 0 when added)

Variable.Name: eadc_CtrlByte
Variable.Description: A single-byte bit pattern, reflecting a number of control parameters

Variable.Name: eadc_BitPack
Variable.Description: A two-byte bit pattern, reflecting a number of process parameters

Variable.Name: eav_Version
Variable.Description: A 2-UINT long version of the command Extended Analysis.\nFirst word - FW version (example: B-5 for beta-5);\n2nd word - the command version within FW version, or zero.

Variable.Name: eapp_posADraw
Variable.Description: Raw position value obtained from A/D converter

Variable.Name: eapp_posTCcalibrated
Variable.Description: TC calibrated position value before magnetic correction

Variable.Name: eapp_posMagnCorrected
Variable.Description: Position value after temperature magnetic correction

Variable.Name: eapp_posLinearized
Variable.Description: Linearized (from ASIN table) position value

Variable.Name: eapp_posScaled
Variable.Description: Position scaled to 0 to 100%

Variable.Name: eapp_temperRaw
Variable.Description: Raw board temperature.

Variable.Name: eapp_temperTCcomp
Variable.Description: TC compensated temperature (divide by 100 to obtain value in degrees C)

Variable.Name: eapp_posTCspan
Variable.Description: Real TC compensated position span.

Variable.Name: eapp_posTCoffset
Variable.Description: Real TC compensated position offset.

Variable.Name: eapp_P_pilot
Variable.Description: Pilot pressure (TC compensated, divide by 250 to obtain psi value)

Variable.Name: eapp_PWM
Variable.Description: Real PWM - value sent to the hardware PWM controller.
